Source.Name: libreoffice
Source.Description: LibreOffice is an open source, multi-platform office productivity suite. It includes key desktop applications such as a word processor, a spreadsheet application, a presentation creator-viewer, a formula editor and a drawing program, with a user interface and feature set similar to other office suites. Sophisticated and flexible, LibreOffice also works transparently with a variety of file formats, including those of Microsoft Office.

Package.Name: libreoffice-kde
Package.Description: libreoffice-kde provides context menu options for "Create New" entry of Dolphin.

Package.Name: libreoffice-python
Package.Description: libreoffice-python is Python binding for the LibreOffice UNO component model. Allows scripts both external to LibreOffice and within the internal LibreOffice scripting module to be written in python.

Package.Name: libreoffice-extension-pdfimport
Package.Description: libreoffice-extension-pdfimpor imports PDF into drawing documents to preserve layout and enable basic editing of PDF documents.

Package.Name: libreoffice-extension-presenter-screen
Package.Description: libreoffice-extension-presenter-screen provides information on a second screen, that typically is not visible to the audience when delivering a presentation. e.g. slide notes.

Package.Name: libreoffice-extension-presentation-minimizer
Package.Summary: Shrink the file size of LibreOffice presentations
Package.Description: libreoffice-extension-presentation-minimizer is used to reduce the file size of the current presentation. Images will be compressed, and data that is no longer needed will be removed.

Package.Name: libreoffice-extension-report-builder
Package.Description: libreoffice-extension-report-builder creates database reports from LibreOffice Base. The report builder can define group and page headers as well as group, page footers and calculation fields to accomplish complex database reports.

Package.Name: libreoffice-extension-wiki-publisher
Package.Summary: Create Wiki articles on MediaWiki servers
Package.Description: libreoffice-extension-wiki-publisher enables you to create Wiki articles on MediaWiki servers without having to know the syntax of the MediaWiki markup language. Publish your new and existing documents transparently with LibreOffice Writer to a wiki page.

Package.Name: libreoffice-langpack-de-extras
Package.Summary: Extra German presentation backgrounds for LibreOffice

Package.Name: libreoffice-langpack-pt_BR
Package.Summary: Brazilian Portuguese language files for LibreOffice

Update.Comment: Strictly depend on the new poppler
